field.name: summary
field.value: A class containing a Nested property and a HasManyAndBelongsTo with a RelationType of IDBag gives an error

field.name: description
field.value:
When the AbstractDepthFirstVisitor visits a nested component, it replaces the currentModel with the nested component model. Later, when the visitor visits the HasAndBelongsToMany property, it checks for the presence of the CollecionIdAttribute associated with the HasAndBelongsToManyAttribute, and cannot find it, because it is looking at the wrong model, i.e., the Nested component model.
As a quick fix, I've moved the visit to the Nested component to the end from the function AbstractDepthFirstVisitor.VisitModel and it worked...
